DeathReaper:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
DeathReaper:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

DeathReaper:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
DeathReaper:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
DeathReaper:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

DeathReaper:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
DeathReaper:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

DeathReaper:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
DeathReaper:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !DeathReaper:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

DeathReaper:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
DeathReaper:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !DeathReaper:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
